I really just want to know why Chris felt it necessary to comment on a post about two men getting married, just to basically tell them he does not approve (or Jesus or Satan or God doesn't approve, I dunno anymore). Why couldn't you have just seen this, said something to yourself, and moved on? What possessed you to make your initial post in the first place? Do you think after this couple reads it, they are going to quickly discover religion, get a divorce, and forever change their ways? What was your purpose for getting involved in the first place?

Other questions people should ask are """"How much will your electric bill go up?"""", """"How long does its battery last?"""", """"What's the price to replace the battery?"""", """"What happens to the discarded batteries?"""". My niece bought a hybrid plug in and the electric bill went up $76 a month on average.
